message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.CY, cs.SI. 

The paper focuses on using deep learning models to improve customer support by combining signals extracted from seller interactions and submitted email questions. This involves natural language processing (NLP) techniques to analyze the email content and machine learning algorithms to analyze the behavior data. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language) which deals with NLP and information retrieval. Other likely sub-categories include cs.IR (Information Retrieval), cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.CY (Computers and Society), and cs.SI (Social and Information Networks).
